articles.title: Lojay teams up with Chris Brown to repaint Monalisa - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: As if Chris Brown had not shocked us enough with his chart-topping duets with other Nigerian acts such as Wizkid and Davido in recent years, the Grammy-winning American singer has yet again joined forces with another Nigerian to serve an intriguing record.
